name: @aave/aave-vault
author: AaveCo
description: ERC-4626 vault for depositing & withdrawing into Aave V3

scripts.rs:abis: forge build --out ./out/__FOLDER_ABIS__ --skip 'test/**/*.sol' --extra-output-files abi && rm -rf ./out/__ABIS__ && mkdir -p ./out/__ABIS__ && find ./out/__FOLDER_ABIS__ -name '*.abi.json' -exec cp {} ./out/__ABIS__/ \;
scripts.rs:generate: npm run rs:bind && npm run rs:abis
